oneOf.title: Empty Task
oneOf.description: An empty task is a possible end of a event's task chain.

Message.description: Shows a simple dialog with information to the user.

description.description: The text is shown to the user.

SingleSelectTask.description: Presents the user with a descriptive test to select one option of a set of up to four.

description.description: Describes the conditions under which the choice of this task is made.

choices.description: A collection of reactions to the proposed problem. One of them must be chosen.

label.description: A short descriptive text explaining the choice. It will be shown on the selection dialog button.

title: RootTask
description: Events are a series of tasks, that a user needs to get through to complete a spot challenge. Each task in a chain can be of different type.

name.description: A unique identifier for the task.

tags.description: A collection of tag words to relate the event to map spots. This only effects the event's root task.
